text: Kiya aap ney nahi dekha kay Allah hi ney zamin ki tamam cheezen tumharay liye musakkhar ker di hain aur uss kay farmaan say pani mein chalti hui kashtiyan bhi. Wohi aasaman ko thamay huye hai kay zamin per uss ki ijazat kay baghair girr na paray be-shak Allah Taalaa logon per shafqat-o-narmi kerney wala aur meharban hai
